title: Spirit Fire Kindred still showing on sale
body:
On the main page of LoL, you see Spirit Fire Kindred on sale but when u click and go buy it, it is not on sale.

Bug or intended?

replies.body:
Hey EdaxVitae,

The store may have glitched here - the sale for Shadowfire Kindred ended on October 18th, so it would make sense that the skin is no longer available for the sale price. 

We'll take a look at the store and see what happened with the messaging v. actual RP price. Thanks for the report!
